prompts: Create a humanoid ice-type Pokemon with long hair and a flowing dress.
Imagine a Pokemon that can freeze its opponents with a single glare.
Design a character that embodies elegance and coolness in the Pokemon world.
Show me a Pokemon that uses psychic powers and ice abilities in battle.
Generate a Pokemon with a striking purple and red color scheme.
Make a unique Pokemon that exudes mystery and charm in its appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in icy environments and has a graceful demeanor.
